required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase I Clinical Trial of a Candidate PCV13 in Healthy People Aged 6 Weeks and Above
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized,Blind, Positive-controlled Phase I Clinical Trial to Preliminary Evaluate the Safety and Immunogencity of 13-Valent Pneumococcal Polysaccharide Conjugate Vaccine（CRM197,TT） in Healthy People Aged 6 Weeks and Above

collaborator.agency: Henan Center for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock: Streptococcus pneumoniae is a major cause of morbidity and mortality in children worldwide, resulting in up to 1 million pediatric deaths every year.Since the licensure of PCV7 and PCV13,the reported overall decline in invasive pneumococcal disease in hospitalized children younger than 5 years several years is approximately 60% in Western countries.This is a single center,blind, randomized, positive-controlled clinical trial.The purpose of this study is to preliminary evaluate the safety of PCV13i vaccine in subjects at age of 7 months and above,and to investigate the safety and immunogenicity of PCV13i vaccine at age of 2 and 3 months,compared to PCV13.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of adverse reactions of each subject(Arm 1A-7B)
Occurrence of SAE of each subject(Arm 1A-7B)
Occurrence of abnormal changes of Hematological examination in subjects of 2 years old and above(Arm 1A-4A)
Occurrence of abnormal changes of Urine test in subjects of 2 years old and above(Arm 1A-4A)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety items of Blood chemistry test
primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of abnormal changes of Blood chemistry test in subjects of 2 years old and above(Arm 1A-4A)
Occurrence of abnormal changes of pressure valus in subjects of 18 years old and above(Arm 1A-2A)
Occurrence of abnormal changes of heart rate in subjects of 18 years old and above(Arm 1A-2A)
Occurrence of adverse reactions of each subject(Arm 1A-7B)

secondary_outcome.measure: immunogencity items of seropositivity rates by ELISA
secondary_outcome.description: Serotype-specific seropositivity rates of Immunoglobulin G concentrations above 0.35ug/ml in subjects aged 2 and 3 months post last vaccination(Arm 6A-7B)

secondary_outcome.measure: immunogencity items of GMC by ELISA
secondary_outcome.description: Serotype specific IgG GMC of each the pneumococcal serotypes in subjects aged 2 and 3 months post last vaccination(Arm 6A-7B)

secondary_outcome.measure: immunogencity items of GMI by ELISA
secondary_outcome.description: Serotype-specific GMI value pneumococcfor each of the pneunococcal serotypes in subjects aged 2 and 3 months post last vaccination(Arm 6A-7B)
Serological response in terms of GMT for each of the pneumococcal serotypes tested by OPA in subjects aged 2 months post last vaccination(7A、7B)

arm_group.description: Subjects received one dose of PCV13i at 18 to 49 years old
Subjects received one dose of PCV13i at 50 years old and above
Subjects received one dose of PCV13i at 6 to 17 years old
Subjects received one dose of PCV13i at 2 to 5 years old
Subjects received two doses of PCV13i at 7 months to 2 years old
Subjects received three doses of PCV13i at 3,4,5 months of age
Subjects received three doses of PCV13i at 2,4,6 months of age
Subjects received three doses of PCV13 at 2,4,6 months of age

overall_official.affiliation: Henan Province Center for Disease Control and Prevention

facility.name: Neihuang Center for Disease Control and Prevention

patient_data.ipd_description: In order to maintain the rights of the subject, do not open the IPD
